      protected boolean isDetachedEntityUpdate(String entityName, Object[] oldState)
      Returns whether the entity has withModifiedFlag features and has no old state, most likely implying it was updated in a detached entity state.

    • Method Detail

      • isDetachedEntityUpdate

        protected boolean isDetachedEntityUpdate(String entityName,
                                         Object[] oldState)
        Returns whether the entity has withModifiedFlag features and has no old state, most likely implying it was updated in a detached entity state.
        Parameters:
        entityName - The associated entity name.
        oldState - The event old (likely detached) entity state.
        Returns:
        true if the entity is/has been updated in detached state, otherwise false.
